description:
Kotarou`s friend Kakeru has a maid who takes care of everything for him, so Kotarou decides to show Kakeru how to do things for himself.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Gourmet na Yatsu!? / Dodge Kotarou / Tanjoukai to wa? / Let`s Iede / Yotte Utatte / Natsumatsuri
グルメな奴!? / ドッジコタロー / 誕生会とは? / レッツ家出 / ヨッテウタッテ / ナツマツリ
